name: Aiser
description:
This game is made for Sega Master System Jam and made in style Sega Master System.

Gameplay:

You are playing as Aiser. She can walk, jump, shot. Aiser has 2 elements, Lembus (Fire) and Gremus (Cold Fire). They can protect you from enemy bullets, even burn an enemy. Your goal is to find an element that Aiser is searching for.

Controls:
  • A - Jump;
  • S - Shoot.
  • Up + S - Change element.
Story:

In the big castle-university, there was a freshman, Aiser. She wants to finish her book. but she is released, in her book is missing one element, that she can't finish. And our freshman is going to the forest to find this element.

Credits:
  • Aiser made by Rextair
  • Music created by The Pix
  • Powered by Clickteam Fusion 2.5+
